# Overnight Oats Recipe :muscle: :bowl:

### *Ingredients:*
> * Half cup milk
> * Half cup oats
> * 1 tbsp chia seeds
> * 8 oz yogurt
> * 2 scoops protein powder

### *Instructions:*
> - Add ingredients to a bowl
> - Mix until protein powder has dissolved into mixture
> - Refridgerate overnight
> - Enjoy with fruits, nuts, and/or nut butter!
